title: Gay guy looking for open-minded/naturist flatshare
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hey,

I'm a 31-year-old gay guy, looking for a flatshare anywhere in zones 1 or 2. I'm a nonsmoker.

Ideally I'm looking to share with one or two other gay guys who are easy-going, social and chill. Open to living with a nudist/naturist. Only nonsmokers, please. 

I can have a flexible moving date. Please feel free to ask any questions over email. Cheers,

Sam
